parameters.definition: Mail carrying capacity of a submarine per trip
Fuel consumption of a submarine per trip
Mail carrying capacity of a boat per trip
Fuel consumption of a boat per trip
Maximum number of submarine trips allowed
Minimum proportion of total trips that must be by boat
Minimum number of pieces of mail to be transported

description: A tropical city full of islands sends mail either by submarine or by boat. A submarine can carry \param{SubmarineCapacity} pieces of mail per trip and uses \param{SubmarineFuel} liters of gas. A boat can carry \param{BoatCapacity} pieces of mail per trip and uses \param{BoatFuel} liters of gas. There can be at most \param{MaxSubmarineTrips} submarine trips and a minimum of \param{MinBoatTripProportion} of the trips must be by boat. If the city needs to transport at least \param{MinMail} pieces of mail, how many of each transportation should they use to minimize the total amount of gas used?
